channel.title: [PI] Starter Message HELP [PI]

item.title: [PI] Starter Message HELP [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Abandoned_Dreams Abandoned Dreams
item.description:
@Abandoned_Dreams wrote:

Okay Guys, In My Source When I Login It Doubles What Ever The Last Line Was On My Starter Msg. (The MSGâ€™s When You Login)
Heres A Picture:

Heres My Starter MSG Codes:

correctCoordinates(); setSidebarInterface(7, 18128); setSidebarInterface(8, 5065); setSidebarInterface(9, 5715); setSidebarInterface(10, 2449); //setSidebarInterface(11, 4445); // wrench tab setSidebarInterface(11, 904); // wrench tab setSidebarInterface(12, 147); // run tab setSidebarInterface(13, -1); setSidebarInterface(0, 2423); sendMessage("Welcome to Abandoned Dreams."); sendMessage("This Server Just Opened So Please Enjoy! =P"); sendMessage("I Am Constantly Watching VPS So When You Login"); sendMessage("I Login About 3 Min Later So Just Wait Lol ;D"); 
		if(inWarriorG() && heightLevel == 2) {
		getPA().movePlayer(2846, 3540, 2);
		}
		//MadTurnipConnection.addDonateItems(this,playerName);
		getPA().loadAnnouncements();
		getPA().showOption(4, 0,"Trade With", 3);
		getPA().showOption(5, 0,"Follow", 4);
		getItems().resetItems(3214);
		getItems().sendWeapon(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], getItems().getItemName(playerEquipment[playerWeapon]));</blockquote>
